INSERT INTO SCHDUL(SCHDUL_SN, SCHDUL_NM, SCHDUL_BEGIN_DATE, SCHDUL_CLOS_DATE) SELECT SCHDUL_SN.NEXTVAL, CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE = 'YRYC020' THEN (SELECT EMPL_NM FROM EMPL WHERE EMPL_ID = YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) || ' 오전반차' WHEN COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE = 'YRYC021' THEN (SELECT EMPL_NM FROM EMPL WHERE EMPL_ID = YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) || ' 오후반차' WHEN COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE = 'YRYC022' THEN (SELECT EMPL_NM FROM EMPL WHERE EMPL_ID = YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) || ' 휴가' ELSE (SELECT EMPL_NM FROM EMPL WHERE EMPL_ID = YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) END AS SCHDUL_NM, YRYC_USE_DTLS_BEGIN_DATE AS SCHDUL_BEGIN_DATE, YRYC_USE_DTLS_END_DATE AS SCHDUL_CLOS_DATE FROM YRYC_USE_DTLS WHERE COMMON_CODE_YRYC_STATE = 'YRYC032' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCHDUL WHERE ( CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE = 'YRYC020' THEN (SELECT EMPL_NM FROM EMPL WHERE EMPL_ID = YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) || ' 오전반차' WHEN COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE = 'YRYC021' THEN (SELECT EMPL_NM FROM EMPL WHERE EMPL_ID = YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) || ' 오후반차' WHEN COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE = 'YRYC022' THEN (SELECT EMPL_NM FROM EMPL WHERE EMPL_ID = YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) || ' 휴가' ELSE (SELECT EMPL_NM FROM EMPL WHERE EMPL_ID = YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) END, SCHDUL_BEGIN_DATE, SCHDUL_CLOS_DATE) IN ( SELECT SCHDUL_NM, YRYC_USE_DTLS_BEGIN_DATE, YRYC_USE_DTLS_END_DATE FROM SCHDUL ) )
